title: Morally Decadent
description: Enzo Agosti. New York mafia royalty.The most sought after bachelor.Now…  My husband. He tricked me into marriage when I was promised to another.He wooed me with sweet words and tender caresses.Only to feed me to the wolves and watch me suffer.His father thinks I'm not worthy of him.His mother wants to torture me to death.  Enzo ignores me during the day and only seeks me out at night.The more I fall for him, the more I realize he doesn't feel the same.Yet just as I plan my escape, two purple lines trap me forever.He says I'm his. That he'll never let me go.But will he be mine, too? Morally Decadent is an angsty enemies-to-lovers dark mafia romance that spans over a decade. It should be read after Morally Corrupt and Morally Blasphemous. This is a very dark book. Please check the triggers before proceeding!
author: Veronica Lancet
